Question.Subject: HELP ME RIP THE AUDIO OFF THIS VIDEO?
Question.Content: http://www.fashion156.com/film.php?issue=22 I can't find a direct url to it, and i supaahh want that song, and I can't find it anywhere else. kaythanks internet people
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Download Audacity and capture the song while the video plays.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f9_pSLG0LZQ http://audacity.sourceforge.net/ http://audacity.sourceforge.net/help/faq?s=install&item=lame-mp3 be sure to read this if you want to export to mp3.

Answer.Content: you can use an audio grabber . like Total Recorder or all sound recorder

Download Audacity and capture the song while the video plays.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f9_pSLG0LZQ http://audacity.sourceforge.net/ http://audacity.sourceforge.net/help/faq?s=install&item=lame-mp3 be sure to read this if you want to export to mp3.
If you want something simple, try one called Audio Recorder For Free.
